name: When The Lights Go Out
description:
This game was created for the SCREAM JAM 2020 with the theme of 'Horror'

The United States is in the middle of the Cold War. Fearing a growing Soviet Arsenal of nuclear weapons, President Nixon has ordered a secret creation of a transparent toxic gas capable of wiping out an entire city within 20 minutes. Testing for this weapon took place in a hidden facility in the heart of Chicago. 

After studying the gas created, researchers discovered that the gas only travels through darkness. However, by the time they figured this out...it was too late. Within a few days the gas had spread all across the Chicagoland area. This includes where you live. Over the past 3 days you've been fine with your lights on 24/7. 

Now the power has gone out and you have 20 minutes to figure out how to turn it back on. Will you be able to do it? Or will you die an unfortunate death?

CONTROLS-

E- to interact with everything around the map.

CLICK- on your inventory hotbar to switch what item is being used.
